Definition: Your task is to generate the next utterance in the history. You will be given a few sentences describing the personality of the person who is making the dialogue, and a history of the dialogue after that. Each line in the history is said by one of the two participants in the conversation.

Positive Examples.input: Personality: I'm a vegetarian. I love summer time. My favorite food is steak cooked well done. I enjoy hunting and fishing on the lake side. Chat history: -Hi you are! I am so tired but good as ever since high school. How about yourself? Mine seems pretty tired from working all day though lol. me too! Anyways up late with it also being married this Summer? Its been great here. Where do your plans for the weekend???! What kind of party? Just my best friend Sarah.
Positive Examples.output: ['I like to go hunting and fishing.']
